extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed version of SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP, SAP Business Intelligence Platform, or SAP NetWeaver AS for Java.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by any of the CVEs?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Fixes for Critical Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the security fixes for the critical vulnerabilities CVE-2023-27269, CVE-2023-25616, CVE-2023-25617, CVE-2023-23857, and CVE-2023-27500.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Additional Recommended Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the other 14 recommended patches to ensure comprehensive security coverage.

affected_products: SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP: versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 791
SAP NetWeaver AS for Java: version 7.50
